originalText.text: These guys are amazing. The drivers are so professional and kind, easy to communicate with and responsive. They transported me and 15 of my students this past weekend to Penn Station. The were kind and patient with the kids and I felt we were is safe hands the entire time. Further, the vehicles are immaculate and new. I can’t recommend them more highly!

The were kind and patient with the kids and I felt we were is safe hands the entire time. Further, the vehicles are immaculate and new. I can’t recommend them more highly!

originalText.text: I have just used Ride in Style Limo for transportation between Newark Airport to Connecticut and I found their service to be excellent! I was very pleased with the booking and confirmation process, and my driver was early and waiting for me upon my arrival. His communication where to meet was great and made it very easy to find him at the busy airport. And the vehicle was immaculate and the driver was excellent getting me safely to my destination. I plan to use Ride in Style Limo on all my future trips to NYC and I highly recommend their service!

text.text: I have just used Ride in Style Limo for transportation between Newark Airport to Connecticut and I found their service to be excellent! originalText.text:
I have had used multiple car services in the past and I would rate my experience with ride in style limo to be one of the highly exceptional one. I was initially skeptical given that my reservation was last minute and was requesting a pick up at JFK with a large family and large number of bags.  They are so prompt in their response, on time and have  communicated with me  through out from reservation to drop off. Their pricing was exceptional, suvs provided were top of the line, very well maintained. The drivers were courteous, exceptional and professional.

Would highly recommend to anyone.

originalText.text: Preet and his team of drivers are kind and respectful professionals! Preet is highly communicative and his drivers’ punctuality is superb! Working with the Ride In Style company truly was a fabulous experience, beginning to end! They worked with me to arrange a pick up of myself and family at two different LaGuardia terminals and safely transport us to our hotel, then provide the round trip transportation 2 days later working around known traffic back-ups to ensure on time arrival for varied flight times. There are many transport companies, but Ride In Style is by far the best! Do yourself a favor and use this outstanding and reasonably priced company! A BIG SHOUT OUT and Thank You to Preet and his excellent team of courteous drivers for everything!!!

originalText.text: Amazing service. Passport control at JFK took about two hours, but the driver was very nice, even though he had to wait as well for 2 hours. Had a nice chat and the ride into new york was smooth and fast.
